SEARCH
Package toffeeSystem

Class loggedinUser

java.lang.Object
toffeeSystem.loggedinUser
public class loggedinUser extends Object
The `loggedinUser` class represents a logged-in user in an online shopping system.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    Map<String,Float>
    cart
    A Map that represents a shopping cart that stores the ID of each item and the amount the user wants to checkout.
    Map<String,Float>
    reminderAmount
    A map that stores the remaining amount of items in the user's cart after they have checked out some of them.

  • Method Summary

    Searches for an item with the given ID in the database and adds it to the cart if it exists.
    void
    makeOrder(String userID)
    Creates a new order in the database for the given user and adds the items in the cart to the order.

  • Field Details

    • cart

      public Map<String,Float> cart
      A Map that represents a shopping cart that stores the ID of each item and the amount the user wants to checkout.

    • reminderAmount

      public Map<String,Float> reminderAmount
      A map that stores the remaining amount of items in the user's cart after they have checked out some of them.

  • Method Details

    • displayItems

      public void displayItems() throws Exception
      Displays all items in the database.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error while connecting to the database or executing the query

    • isExist

      public float isExist(String itemId) throws Exception
      Searches for an item with the given ID in the database and adds it to the cart if it exists.
      Parameters:
      itemId - the ID of the item to search for
      Returns:
      the amount of the item found, or 0 if the item does not exist in the database
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error connecting to the database or executing the query

    • makeOrder

      public void makeOrder(String userID) throws Exception
      Creates a new order in the database for the given user and adds the items in the cart to the order. Calculates the total price of the order based on the items' prices and amounts. If the user has any vouchers, applies the applicable voucher to the total price. Updates the amount of each item in the database and clears the cart.
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user who is making the order
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error connecting to the database or executing the query
